Text: Hans Herr House, also known as the Christian Herr House, is a historic home located in West Lampeter Township, Lancaster County, Pennsylvania.
Triplets:<Hans Herr House
1:
--------------------
<Text: Hans Herr House:  It was built in 1719, and is a 1 1/2-story, rectangular sandstone Germanic dwelling.>
Triplets:<Hans Herr House
2:
--------------------
Text: Hans Herr House:  It measures 37 feet, 9 inches, by 30 feet, 10 inches.
Triplets:<Hans Herr House
4:
--------------------
<Text: Hans Herr House:  The Mennonites who worshipped there formed the nucleus of what became the Willow Street Mennonite Congregation.>
Triplets:<Hans Herr House
5:
--------------------
<Text: Hans Herr House:  It was restored to its 1719 appearance in 1972-73.>
Triplets:<Hans Herr House
